attributes.action: Don't bomb Syria under any circumstances.
attributes.background: We the British people ask our government not to draw us in to another long unjust war by bombing Syria.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105276

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
